_header: Jesu for thy mickle might / Thou give us of thy grace
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Passion, meditations on
_description: A Meditation on the Passion — five 10-line stanzas (ababccdeed)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Iesu for þi muchele mihtþou ȝef vs of þi
                    grace…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…When he wolde make þe freant bicome þi
                    broþer
BLHar2253.Note:
First two lines of each stanza written two lines of verse per line of
                    MS.
